basic.comment: A basic move that doesn't end in a basin.

wrap.comment: Make sure we don't deposite stones in the opponent's basin, or let A go when it's not her turn

capture.comment: Player A captures 13 of B's stones in bin_B1

not_a_capture.comment: Make sure it's not a capture if the player lands in an empty bin on the opposite side

endGame1.comment: A basic finale in which Player A finishes but doesn't have enough points. Player B should win 25-23

endGame2.comment: Testing the 25-point stopping point. Player A should win 25-5

endGame3.comment: Should be a tie when Player B's remaining stones are apportioned.
